detail_desc: Short strappy top in soft organic cotton jersey with printed contrasting colour panels at the sides.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist and a zip fly and button.
Tights with an elasticated waist and a reinforced toe section.
Straight, knee-length dress in woven fabric with long sleeves with a decorative scalloped trim down the outside. Unlined.
Leggings with wide elastication at the waist.
Soft bandeau bras in lace and jersey with a silicone trim at the top and support panels in the sides. Mesh lining at the front.
Shaping briefs in microfibre with a lined gusset, high waist with a laser-cut edge, and wide lace trims at the hems. Light shaping effect on the waist, hips and bum.
Short shorts in a patterned viscose weave with pleats at the top, elastication at the back of the waistband, side pockets and wide legs.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.

Suit trousers in a linen weave with an extended waistband and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs with raw-edge hems.

Single-breasted jacket in a linen weave with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and two buttons at the front. Chest pocket, welt front pockets and two inner pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Partly lined. Slim Fit – a fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Warm-lined boots in waterproof, functional fabric with imitation leather details and an ankle-height shaft with an elastic drawstring at the top. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Dress in airy chiffon with a shimmering metallic jacquard pattern. Gathered V-neck with a wide, flounced trim, a concealed zip at the back and short sleeves with a flounced trim. Seam at the waist with a wide flounce at the front and a flared, voluminous skirt with flounces down the sides. Lined.
Platform sandals in imitation leather with covered heels and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles and fluted soles. Platform front 2.5 cm, heel 9.5 cm.
Fitted, short-sleeved top in ribbed jersey, designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Fancy dress costume in velour with faux fur appliqués, a V-neck and large, double-layered collar in airy fabric. Concealed zip at the back, long sleeves and short legs.
Short shorts in stretch twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, front and back pockets and a lace trim at the hems.
Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with sections in ventilating mesh. Regular waist and a wide waistband with a concealed key pocket.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in crinkled jersey with smocking around the neckline and hem and long, wide sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Fine-knit T-shirt in slub cotton yarn with an open chest pocket with roll edge, seam centre back and roll edges around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
T-shirt in jersey with a motif.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. One pair with plastic beads and tassels. Size from 0.3 cm to 6 cm.
Fully lined bikini top with removable inserts, narrow shoulder straps and no fasteners.
Swim shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Wide top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs and a raw, cut-off hem.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a T-shirt and leggings in lightweight, patterned cotton jersey. T-shirt with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and a gently rounded hem. Longer at the back. Leggings with an elasticated waist.

Cropped jacket in imitation leather with a diagonal zip down the front and small notch lapels with a decorative metal button. Long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs and zipped front pockets. Lined in taffeta made from recycled polyester.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a wide, ribbed polo neck, low dropped shoulders and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Vest top in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck front and back and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.

Calf-length dress in softly draping satin with a V-neck, concealed buttons down the front and short sleeves. Detachable tie belt at the waist and pleats at the front of the skirt for added width. Unlined.

Running jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a zip down the front, hood with an elasticated edge, elasticated cuffs, reflective details and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Discreet mobile phone pocket with a press-stud at one side, size approx. 9.5x17 cm.
Fully lined sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and elasticated hem.
5-pocket low-rise jeans in washed denim with hard-worn details, a button fly and slightly wider, tapered legs.
Socks in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Set with a long-sleeved jumper and pair of trousers in soft jacquard knit cotton. Jumper with a roll-edge neckline, decorative bow at the top, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated waist.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Round-necked jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Blouse in airy chiffon with floral appliqués on the front and a wide, elasticated neckline. Short raglan sleeves and an elasticated hem. Satin lining.
Espadrilles in fabric with a braided jute trim around the soles, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Long-sleeved cardigan in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with raw edges. Jersey-lined hood and patch front pockets. No fasteners.
Short, wide hooded sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing at the hem.
Long-sleeved top in Sweatshirt fabric with print motifs and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Headband in fast-drying fabric with reflective details.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in soft, printed jersey with appliqués on the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and fringing at the hem.
Trousers in soft cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and full feet with elasticated heels.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline.
Laptop bag in grained imitation leather with a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap, two handles and a zip at the top. One zipped inner compartment and one laptop sleeve. Lined. Size 5.5x28x38 cm.

Sleeveless, knee-length dress in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim with a sweetheart neckline and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Wide smocking at the back and buttons down the front. Double layer at the top.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an adjustable, elasticated waist and decorative flatlock seams.

Lined bandeau bikini top with underwired, lightly padded cups and decorative gathers at the front and sides. Detachable shoulder straps that tie at the back of the neck and a fastening at the back. Side support and a silicone trim at the top.

Top in soft jersey with a small frill around the neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Smocking across the chest, a seam below the bust and long puff sleeves with smocking and a small frill at the cuffs. Unlined.
Sandals in soft suede with narrow elastication at the back of the heel. Covered block heels 7 cm.
Striped pyjamas in a soft cotton weave. Long-sleeved shirt with notch lapels, buttons down the front, a chest pocket and buttoned cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and straight, wide legs.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a print motif and reversible sequins on the front.
V-neck satin top with three narrow shoulder straps and an asymmetric hem.
Striped T-shirt in cotton jersey.
Short fitted top in ribbed jersey with a lace-trimmed V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and short legs.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Lined hood with a collar and drawstring, taped zip down the front, side pockets with taped zips and a zipped inner pocket. Polyester filling. Lined.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar and detachable, pile-lined hood. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, a chin guard, front pockets and elasticated cuffs. Partly lined in fleece.
Cotton jersey shorts with side pockets and an elasticated waist with a frill trim and bow.
Short jersey dress with a round neckline, dropped shoulders and short sleeves.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Wide, calf-length dress in a viscose crêpe weave with a double layer of large flounces at the top and a V-neck with a detailed trim and a drawstring that can be pulled to tighten at the back of the neck and front. Extra-long sleeves with decorative pin-tucks and detachable cuffs. Asymmetric waist, heavily draping skirt and an asymmetric hem with a wide flounce. Raw-edge seams around the flounces at the neckline and hem. Unlined.
Flat cap in woven fabric. Lined.

Bikini top in lace with a decorative tie detail at the front and underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Ties at the back of the neck and an adjustable hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Sarong in an airy, patterned weave. Size 130x150 cm.

Short dress in a viscose weave with a round neckline and small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long, wide sleeves with a small puff at the shoulders, narrow frill trim around the elbows and covered elastication at the cuffs. Flared skirt with gathered tiers. Unlined.
5-pocket trousers in imitation leather with a regular waist and slim legs.
Set with a knitted hooded jacket and trousers in soft thermal fleece. Jacket with a pile-lined hood and ears at the top. Trousers with wide jersey ribbing at the waist.
Wide, sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck with a pleat centre front. Rounded hem, longer at the back.
STUDIO COLLECTION. T-shirt in stretch ribbed cotton jersey with worn details around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with short sleeves and short legs. Ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hems, and press-stud fastenings.
Short, A-line skirt with a high waist and buttons down the front.
Cardigan knitted in soft, garter-stitched organic cotton with a hood with ears, and a double-breasted front.

Straight-style, calf-length dress in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.

Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist that has gathered elastication at the back and pleats at the front. Discreet pockets in the side seams, a low crotch and wide, flared legs with slits at the hems.
